talk_paragraph.talk_question: <html>{ui_string:1200001}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200002}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200003}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200004}</html>
<html>{ui_string:1200005}</html>

$Adventurer David$
Did you even go to the Royal Castle and report to that Bishop yet?
This isn't where we promised to meet at, is it? I just came out to check the ship's schedule.
(You can begin by talking to Bishop Ignacio at Saint Haven.)

$Adventurer David$
Why are you taking so long? Didn't you say that you would just go to the Royal Castle and report to that Bishop or whatever?
Hurry up!
(You can begin by talking to Bishop Ignacio at Saint Haven.)

$Geraint$
Are you here to see the descendant of the Ancients again?
Nobody can lay a finger on her, unless I am defeated. Trust me.
(You can begin by talking to Bishop Ignacio at Saint Haven.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
It's a good thing that I picked up the Pendant that you dropped. Things could have become difficult for all of us if somebody else had picked it up.

$Adventurer David$
Did you even go to the Royal Castle and report to that Bishop or whatever?
Didn't we promise to meet at Foothills of Black Mountain? I just briefly came out to check out the ship's schedule.

$Adventurer David$
Why are you taking so long? Didn't you say that you would just go to the Royal Castle and report to that Bishop or whatever?
Hurry up!

$Geraint$
Are you here to see the descendant of the Ancients again?
Nobody can lay a finger on her, unless I am defeated. Trust me.

$Bishop Ignacio$
Well, good job.
As I have mentioned, I must check the logistics of Saint Haven and get started on overdue task. You may leave now, catch some rest

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I have made a promise with somebody, so I am going to drop by Foothills of Black Mountain.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Bishop Ignacio$
Where will you go now?
I don't think the Gold Dragon will really deal with others right now...
Do you have something to do?

$Bishop Ignacio${action:Talk}
You're going to Foothills Foothills of Black Mountain ?
You always seem to find something to do. You're very reliable.
(Meet Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain.)

$Bishop Ignacio$
Didn't you say that you were going to meet somebody at Foothills of Black Mountain ?
That person should be waiting for you, so hurry up.
(Meet Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>You were the one who was asking for my help.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
You're finally here? I've been waiting forever!
I was just thinking about leaving!
(Adventurer David is being pretentious.)

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(Let's just not say more about it...)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David${action:Stand01}
H-help?! You have misunderstood me!
All I did was give you the opportunity to work for Argenta! That's what I meant!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>... What are you talking about? What is the errand about?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Well anyway! Since that's the case, just cooperate with a joyful heart.
Argenta told me to wait for her after I completed the errand, otherwise I would not be waiting here.

$Adventurer David$
I was told to bring back some Dark Core Crumbs from the Dark overlord's Tower.
Argenta told me that I could get some by defeating the monsters at the tower.

$Adventurer David$
Ha. Ha. Ha. Don't be a crybaby, and just go.
I will be waiting right here!

$Adventurer David$
Now! Go to Dark Overlord's Tower.
Show those monsters a lesson and bring back the Dark Core Crumbs. Ha. Ha. Ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Everything is complete now, right? Good bye.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Whoa! You've brought all the Core Crumbs.
I always thought you are a lazy one, but your quick this time round
Of course, this would have been a piece of cake for me, Adventurer David. Ha. Ha. Ha.

$Adventurer David${action:Stand01}
W-wait! Wait! Why are you so impetuous?
You're still so young. Tsk tsk.
The Dark Core Crumbs must be sent to Geraint.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I guess I can do that. Well anyway, goodbye.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
That's right! Argenta said so. She told me to take the Dark Core Crumbs to Geraint!
I am going to go to Argenta soon, so deliver these for me.

$Adventurer David$
Oh! And I also have something to ask you.
So 50 years ago, Geraint was the leader of the Six Heroes, right? I know this because I have heard it from Argenta.

$Adventurer David$
What I am curious about is... Why in the world isn't my beautiful and powerful goddess, Argenta, a member of the Six Heroes?
Aren't you curious? Doesn't it just drive you crazy because you're so curious?

$Adventurer David$
What? What's with the lackadaisical attitude? You're not curious? Tsk tsk...
A teenager is supposed to be curious about everything!
... So for the sake of me, who is at an age of curiosity!
Go and ask!

$Adventurer David$
Good, good. Then go to Geraint.
When you get an answer, come to Hermalte Port. I will be waiting for the ship there. Hah.

$Adventurer David$
Why haven't you gone to Geraint yet?
I will be going to Hermalte Port, so finish your business and see me there. Got that?

$Adventurer David$
Why are you still holding the thing that I told you to deliver to Geraint?
I was quick as a troll, so I was able to come here quickly and wait like this, but you are slow like an orc! Ha. Ha. Ha.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>I've brought it on behalf of Argenta's request.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I feel the faint energy of the Black Dragon.
Do you have the Dark Core Crumbs?

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Okay. And I also had a question.</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I can see that this was sent to be used for healing the wounds.
Alright. It is dangerous for you, so do not touch too much of it.

$Geraint$
A question...? What is it?

$Geraint$
So you're curious about what happened 50 years ago.
Five different forces joined together to defeat the Black Dragon at the time.
(Geraint calmly speaks.)

$Geraint$
Elf Nerwin's Silver Crescent Archers.
Warrior Barnac's Mercenary Guild.
The Templar Knights, led by Cleric Terra.
Dark Tower, led by Sorceress Karacule.

$Geraint$
And...
Velskud's Cassius Kingdom Knights.

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>Are you talking about Dark Elf Elena?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Geraint$
I was the leader. Argenta went on independently to check the situation of the Elf Queen's Army.
And then, she was not able to join the first group because she had to face the Dark Elf, who was attacking the second group.

$Geraint$
That's right. Argenta faced the monster troops led by Elena, and she nearly annihilated them.
And when the Black Dragon was defeated, the people began to title the six ones who led each force, the Six Heroes.

$Geraint$
That's why there are no records about Argenta, who worked independently. Excluding the ones who are called the heroes, most are even unaware of her existence.

$Geraint$
Only humans obsess over titles and records.
Because of the brevity of life, they covet the things that last for a long time.
Such things are meaningless to me and Argenta.

$Geraint$
Is there anything else you would like to ask?
(You must return to Adventurer David at Hermalte Port.)

$Adventurer David${action:Stand01}
I was just expecting you to arrive now! Ha. Ha. Ha.
I assume you met Geraint, right?

$Adventurer David$
So how is it that my beautiful , lovely, and ultra perfect Argenta was not known as one of the heroes?! Did you find out why? Tell me!

$Adventurer David${action:Stand01}
(After listening to the story, Adventurer David's eyes sparkle.)
Oh, my Argenta! So having fame among the humans is as meaningless to her as a piece of useless cloth!
Wow! Oh what a profound and sophisticated world view! Wow!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>How did you know that Argenta is a dragon?</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
Fools shiver when they think of dragons because they imagine the dragons to be like the Boss of the monsters, but I'm different.
Just look at Argenta! I have no doubt that a dragon is an alter ego of the goddess, Altea, and that they are a noble being!!

talk_paragraph.talk_answer: <html>(She would answered you whenever you ask her)</html>
talk_paragraph.talk_question:
$Adventurer David$
What kind of a fool wouldn't know that? Ha. Just don't get too surprised about this, but
I!
... I bravely asked Argenta myself. Ha. Ha. Ha.
<html>$Quest Reward$</html>

journal.title: Greeting
journal.contents:
You have completed your task. Please go and greet Bishop Ignacio

Saint Haven Royal Castle → Bishop Ignacio

journal.title: An Unwelcomed Guest
journal.contents:
Now go to Foothills of Black Mountain and meet Adventurer David. It seems there is something going on.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Adventurer David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain
journal.todo_msg: Talk to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: Dark Core Shard
journal.contents:
It seems like Adventurer David was in the middle of an errand for Argenta. You must obtain the Dark Core Crumbs from the Dark Overlord's Tower.

Foothills of Black Mountain (Dark overlord keep's Gates) → Dark Overlord's Tower
journal.todo_msg: Collect Dark Core Crumbs at Dark Overlord's Tower.

journal.title: Adventurer David is waiting
journal.contents:
Since you have obtained the Dark Core Crumbs, take it to Adventurer David, who is waiting for you.

Foothills of Black Mountain → Adventurer David
journal.destination: Go Foothills of Black Mountain and speak to Adventurer David
journal.todo_msg: Deliver Dark Core Crumbs to Adventurer David at Foothills of Black Mountain

journal.title: Adventurer David's question
journal.contents:
You must take what you have obtained to Geraint. Deliver the item to Geraint, and also ask Adventurer David's question.

Saint Haven(Underground Secret Region) → Geraint
journal.todo_msg: Deliver the Dark Core Crumbs to Geraint.

journal.title: Argenta's Past
journal.contents:
It seems like Argenta worked independently from the Six Heroes, 50 years ago. That is also when she has fought Elena. Now inform Geraint of the answer from Adventurer David

Hermalte Port → Adventurer David
journal.destination: Talk to Adventurer David at Hermalte Port
journal.todo_msg: Return to Adventurer David at Hermalte Port
